title: essentials op无法使用essentials权限
author: a43991995
txt_content:
本帖最后由 a43991995 于 2020-3-24 20:39 编辑 

op无法使用essentials权限，比如：/essentials reload
只显示

[groups.yml]
# Group inheritance
#
# Any inherited groups prefixed with a g: are global groups
# and are inherited from the GlobalGroups.yml.
#
# Groups without the g: prefix are groups local to this world
# and are defined in the this groups.yml file.
#
# Local group inheritances define your promotion tree when using 'manpromote/mandemote'

groups:
  Moderator:
    default: false
    permissions: []
    inheritance:
    - builder
    - g:groupmanager_moderator
    - g:bukkit_moderator
    - g:essentials_moderator
    - g:towny_moderator
    - g:vanish_moderator
    info:
      build: true
      prefix: '&5[协管]'
      suffix: ''
  Owner:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - +vanish.effects.toggle.all
    - -vanish.effects.*
    - -essentials.*
    - '*'
    inheritance:
    - admin
    info:
      build: true
      prefix: '&6[服主]'
      suffix: ''
  Builder:
    default: true
    permissions: []
    inheritance:
    - default
    - g:essentials_builder
    - g:towny_builder
    info:
      build: true
      prefix: '&7[居民]'
      suffix: ''
  Admin:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - essentials.*
    inheritance:
    - moderator
    - g:groupmanager_admin
    - g:bukkit_admin
    - g:essentials_admin
    - g:towny_admin
    - g:vanish_admin
    info:
      build: true
      prefix: '&c[管理员]'
      suffix: ''
  vip:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - essentials.fly
    inheritance:
    - builder
    info:
      build: false
      prefix: ''
      suffix: ''
  Default:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - -bukkit.command.kill
    inheritance:
    - g:groupmanager_default
    - g:bukkit_default
    - g:essentials_default
    - g:towny_default
    info:
      build: false
      prefix: '&2[游客]'
      suffix: ''
复制代码后台无任何报错信息。唯独 被拒绝使用命令 ,后台可以essentials reload

catserver端 / EssentialsX-2.15.0.60 /GroupManagerPlus-2.0.4-b136

新增问题: time 08:38/mangadd test 
/manuadd user test
/mangaddp essentials.*
test组 可执行ess reload

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
你这被给了负权限，当然没有权限了

  Owner:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - +vanish.effects.toggle.all
    - -vanish.effects.*
    - -essentials.*

replies.author: EmptyLava
replies.txt_content:
给予op essentials.*权限
manuaddp id essentials.*
或者将op升入admin组
manuadd id admin
然后在admin组内给权限
mangaddp admin essentials.*

replies.author: a43991995
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2020-3-24 20:27
你这被给了负权限，当然没有权限了

  Owner:
一样的。
/mangaddp admin -essentials.*
/mangaddp admin essentials.*
都试过。8得行

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
a43991995 发表于 2020-3-24 20:28
一样的。
/mangaddp admin -essentials.*
/mangaddp admin essentials.*
直接编辑掉这段呢？

replies.author: a43991995
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2020-3-24 20:29
直接编辑掉这段呢？
相同不变

replies.author: 炫宙菌
replies.txt_content:
管理组的
   inheritance:
以下包括的几个组继承可以删掉 取消继承(不是删组)

replies.author: KZBBYCM
replies.txt_content:
把owner组的这两个权限删除即可：
    - -vanish.effects.*
    - -essentials.*
指令：/mangdelp owner -vanish.effects.*
/mangdelp owner -essentials.*
